marklogic.body:
The courier has 56 minutes before it is no longer "Saturday morning" & the promised delivery window Â is past. And I really don't want to have to drive out to the airport depot to collect the package.
But in happy news, I get to pick up my new laptop in a couple of hours! Yay for a computer that doesn't hang every 20 minutes & Overheat & sound like it's going to take Off & start hovering :)
Last night's Old Mout boysenberry cider was so good, I think I'll continue with that.
